src:
Statistik Laga Atalanta vs Man City: Claudio Bravo Sang Pencetak Rekor Baru
07 Nov 2019, 08:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester City gagal meraup poin penuh saat melawat ke markas Atalanta dalam matchday ke-4 fase grup Liga Champions, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari tadi. Skuat besutan Josep Guardiola tersebut hanya mampu meraih hasil imbang 1-1.
Klub berjuluk the Citizens tersebut sempat unggul melalui aksi Raheem Sterling saat pertandingan baru berjalan tujuh menit. Atalanta berhasil menyamakan skor melalui Mario Pasalic di awal babak kedua.
Pertandingan kali ini diwarnai oleh kartu merah yang diberikan kepada kiper Manchester City, Claudio Bravo, pada menit ke-81. Selain itu, Gabriel Jesus juga gagal menunaikan tugasnya sebagai eksekutor penalti pada menit ke-43.
Sejumlah catatan menarik juga tercipta pada pertandingan kali ini. Salah satunya berhubungan dengan kartu merah yang didapatkan Bravo. Informasi lengkap yang disadur dari BBC Sport bisa disimak dengan melakukan scroll ke bawah.
text:
Atalanta vs Man City Match Statistics: Claudio Bravo the New Record Printer
Nov 7 2019, 08:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester City failed to get full points when visiting Atalanta headquarters in the 4th matchday of the Champions League group phase on Thursday (11/07/2019) early this morning. Josep Guardiola's squad was only able to achieve a 1-1 draw.
The club nicknamed the Citizens had excelled through the action of Raheem Sterling when the game had only been running for seven minutes. Atalanta managed to equalize the score through Mario Pasalic early in the second half.
This match was marked by a red card given to Manchester City goalkeeper Claudio Bravo in the 81st minute. In addition, Gabriel Jesus also failed to fulfill his duties as a penalty executor in the 43rd minute.
A number of interesting notes were also created in this match. One of them relates to the red card obtained by Bravo. Detailed information adapted from BBC Sport can be listened to by scrolling down.
